definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Te4 she4 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: The proceeds will go to Amnesty International and other human rights organizations.
sentences.chinese: 拍賣所得將全數捐給國際特赦組織等人權團體。

sentences.english: Amnesty International fears that all four are at risk of torture and other ill-treatment if arrested.
sentences.chinese: 國際特赦組織擔憂這四人若被逮捕，恐遭刑求虐待。

sentences.english: But Amnesty describes the Australia's position is a poling.
sentences.chinese: 但是國際特赦組織說澳大利亞的做法太過極端。
